means: 南斯拉夫的，南斯拉夫人的

sentence.Network_en: Early this morning the Yugoslav nation found its soul.
sentence.Network_cn: 今日清晨,南斯拉夫民族获得了新生.

sentence.Network_en: Hitler described the Yugoslav situation after the upheaval.
sentence.Network_cn: 希特勒描述了这次剧变后南斯拉夫的局势.

sentence.Network_en: The yugoslav speak serbo croat, but I can not speak it.
sentence.Network_cn: 南斯拉夫人讲塞尔维亚-克罗地亚语, 但我不会讲这种语言.

entry.tran: 南斯拉夫的；南斯拉夫人的；南斯拉夫文化的
entry.def: Yugoslav means belonging or relating to the former Yugoslavia, or to its people or culture.

example.tran: 华盛顿的南斯拉夫大使馆

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Yugoslavia
1. of or relating to or characteristic of the former country of Yugoslavia or its people or languages;
